package.name: cram_object_knowledge
package.description: CRAM internal implementation of manipulation interfaces, storing grasps etc. for specific object types, as well as their type hierarchy and other related object knowledge. This knowledge can also be stored in KnowRob and queried using the same manipulation interfaces. This package enables CRAM to function independently of KnowRob for people who want a lightweight system.
package.author: Gayane Kazhoyan
